content.p: On-line search clustering engine based on Carrot2. It will organize the results of your queries to Yahoo!, Google, Wikipedia, Open Directory Project and more. Try it!

Standalone GUI clustering tool for playing with Carrot2 clustering algorithms. It will let you modify parameters of the algorithms and watch the effects in real-time. Launch it! (requires Java Web Start)

Search plugin for Mozilla and Firefox that will send queries directly from your browser to the Carrot2 on-line search clustering engine.
Get the plugin for Mozilla/Firefox 1.x
Get the plugin for Mozilla/Firefox 2.x/IE7+
You can also add a Carrot2-powered search box to your site.
